translation.en: Hmm. Honey, nature's happy sauce.
translation.zh: 蜂蜜 大自然的快乐酱汁

translation.en: You can drizzle it, you can pour it,
translation.zh: 可以淋着吃 可以倒着吃

translation.en: you can fill a tiny plastic bear with it and squeeze.
translation.zh: 也可以装在塑料小熊罐子里 然后挤出来吃

translation.en: But what's all the buzz about honey?
translation.zh: 但是为什么大家都在谈论蜂蜜呢？

translation.en: Yeah, that's what's on the menu today at…
translation.zh: 是啊 这就是今天的菜单

translation.en: [Waffles and Mochi] ♪ Waffles and Mochi's Restaurant! ♪
translation.zh: 松饼与麻薯 开餐厅！

translation.en: -[bell chimes] -Oh, hello. Welcome.
translation.zh: 你好 欢迎光临

translation.en: Right this way, please. I've got a wonderful table for you.
translation.zh: 这边请 我有一张很棒的桌子给你

translation.en: I'm Busy, the maître bee. [laughs]
translation.zh: 我是忙忙 蜜蜂服务员

translation.en: Okay. A menu for you. [buzzes]
translation.zh: 好了 给你的菜单

translation.en: And a napkin. Excellent.
translation.zh: 还有餐巾 太棒了

translation.en: Bon appétit. [chuckles, gasps]
translation.zh: 好胃口

translation.en: No straws?
translation.zh: 没有吸管吗？

translation.en: Drink up!
translation.zh: 喝吧！

translation.en: Would you like that food to go?
translation.zh: 你想要打包吗？

translation.en: Excellent. I'll just take that for you. [mumbles]
translation.zh: 太好了 我来帮您吧

translation.en: There you are. Ah! Enjoy! [buzzes]
translation.zh: 好了 祝您愉快！

translation.en: Anybody else?
translation.zh: 还有谁需要服务？

translation.en: [sighs] I love my job.
translation.zh: 我爱我的工作

translation.en: That was the busiest our restaurant has ever been.
translation.zh: 我们的餐厅从来没有这样忙过

translation.en: Hey, friends.
translation.zh: 嘿 朋友们

translation.en: [all] Hey-o, Mrs. O.
translation.zh: 你好 奥夫人！

translation.en: What's cookin'?
translation.zh: 大家都在做什么呢？

translation.en: I'm gonna go get the rest of your delivery.
translation.zh: 我去帮你拿剩下的东西

translation.en: Thanks so much, Danny.
translation.zh: 太感谢啦 丹尼

translation.en: Mochi, here you go.
translation.zh: 麻薯 给你

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: What's in the basket, Mrs. O?
translation.zh: 篮子里有什么 奥夫人？

translation.en: Oh, have I got some great stuff for your dinner menu tonight.
translation.zh: 我为你们今晚的晚餐 准备了很棒的食材

translation.en: -Yeah? -Got a little eggplant, some peppers,
translation.zh: -是吗？ -有茄子 有辣椒

translation.en: -lettuce, and cauliflower. -[Busy gasps]
translation.zh: 还有生菜和花椰菜

translation.en: Did you say cauliflower?
translation.zh: 你刚说花椰菜吗？

translation.en: [laughs] Oh, boy.
translation.zh: 天啊

translation.en: Ah! Reminds me of when I was just a little bee back on the farm.
translation.zh: 让我想起了小时候在农场的时光

translation.en: -They grew cauliflower on the farm? -Oh, yes.
translation.zh: 他们在农场种花椰菜？ 是啊

translation.en: Such wonderful memories of a simpler time. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 那时候生活更单纯 真是美好的回忆

translation.en: Oh, wow.
translation.zh: 哇哦

translation.en: It looks like you guys were pretty busy at the lunch service today.
translation.zh: 看起来你们今天的午餐时段很忙啊

translation.en: -[Waffles] Yeah. -Sure were.
translation.zh: -是啊 -当然

translation.en: Oh, you should have seen us, Mrs. O.
translation.zh: 你真该看看我们的样子 奥夫人

translation.en: Mochi, over here, was boiling and frying!
translation.zh: 麻薯在这边又煮又煎！

translation.en: -[Waffles] Yeah. -Waffles was stirring and whisking.
translation.zh: -是啊 -松饼在忙着搅拌

translation.en: Danny, you were right by our side the whole time.
translation.zh: 丹尼 你一直都在我们身边

translation.en: And, Yuki, you were serving up the customers super fast.
translation.zh: 友纪 你上菜的速度也超快呢

translation.en: And Bella was announcing every order.
translation.zh: 只要有菜做好 小铃铛就会提醒呢

translation.en: Like this.
translation.zh: 就像这样

translation.en: I love that sound.
translation.zh: 我喜欢那声音

translation.en: Anyone else who was super helpful?
translation.zh: 还有谁在热情帮忙呢？

translation.en: Oh! I almost forgot. Yes?
translation.zh: -我差点忘了 -怎么样？

translation.en: -The real hero of the day… -Oh. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 今天真正的英雄

translation.en: …is Steve.
translation.zh: 是史蒂夫

translation.en: -[splutters] -He cleaned up all that spaghetti.
translation.zh: 他把意面都清理干净了

translation.en: What? Oh, I was just hungry.
translation.zh: 什么？我只是饿了

translation.en: Oh, there's more on my face.
translation.zh: 呀 我脸上还有更多

translation.en: I… I'll be right back.
translation.zh: 我…我马上回来

translation.en: -[door locks] -He locked himself in the bathroom.
translation.zh: 他把自己锁在卫生间里了

translation.en: Was it something we said?
translation.zh: 是我们说什么了吗？

translation.en: I think it was something you didn't say, Waffles.
translation.zh: 我觉得是因为你忘说什么了 松饼

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: See, everyone was talking about how busy everyone else was
translation.zh: 你看呀 大家都在说其他人有多忙

translation.en: except for Busy.
translation.zh: 但没有夸忙忙

translation.en: -Oh, no. I feel awful. -[Danny] Oh.
translation.zh: 不是吧 我觉得好懊恼呀

translation.en: What should we do?
translation.zh: 我们该怎么办呢？

translation.en: I think you need to apologize and show him how much you appreciate him.
translation.zh: 我觉得你应该道歉 应该告诉他 你有多感激他

translation.en: When I wanna show somebody that I appreciate them,
translation.zh: 当我想向别人表达感激时

translation.en: I bring them something I know they'll really, really love.
translation.zh: 我会给他们送去 他们会非常喜欢的东西

translation.en: [gasps] Like puppies?
translation.zh: 比如小狗吗？

translation.en: -Oh, well, we're talking about Busy. -[Waffles] Oh.
translation.zh: 哦 我们是在说忙忙

translation.en: -Oh. Honey! -[Mochi] Mm-hmm.
translation.zh: 哦 蜂蜜！

translation.en: [all] Yeah!
translation.zh: 没错！

translation.en: We should cook something with honey for Busy.
translation.zh: 用蜂蜜做点美食 送给忙忙

translation.en: I think that would be a lovely idea.
translation.zh: 我觉得这主意妙极了

translation.en: But we don't know anything about honey.
translation.zh: 但我们并不了解蜂蜜

translation.en: Well, the first thing you can do is visit a honey farm.
translation.zh: 那你可以先去参观一下蜂蜜农场

translation.en: -That's a great idea! -[meeps]
translation.zh: 好主意！

translation.en: And I happen to have the card of a great one right here.
translation.zh: 我正好有一张超赞的农场主的名片

translation.en: Thank you so much, Mrs. O.
translation.zh: 太谢谢你了 奥夫人

translation.en: Glad to be of service.
translation.zh: 乐意效劳

translation.en: -I will leave you to it. Good luck. -[chuckles]
translation.zh: 那我就先走了 祝你们好运

translation.en: [all] Thank you.
translation.zh: -谢谢 -谢谢

translation.en: Bye.
translation.zh: -再见 -再见

translation.en: All right, we know what we must do.
translation.zh: 好了 我们知道要做什么了

translation.en: To the magic cart!
translation.zh: 去开魔法马车吧！

translation.en: Our food mission, should we choose to eat it,
translation.zh: 本次美食任务 入口之前精挑细选

translation.en: learn all about honey, so we can make something super delicious
translation.zh: 了解蜂蜜的知识 做出超级美味的东西

translation.en: to cheer up Busy.
translation.zh: 让忙忙开心起来

translation.en: Look, there's the honey farm!
translation.zh: 看啊 蜂蜜农场在那里！

translation.en: -Let's go, Mochi. -[meeps]
translation.zh: 我们走吧 麻薯

translation.en: -Another perfect landing! -[Mochi meeps in agreement]
translation.zh: 又一次完美降落！

translation.en: -Wow! -[meeps]
translation.zh: 哇哦

translation.en: Look at this honey farm, Mochi.
translation.zh: 看看这个蜂蜜农场呀 麻薯

translation.en: -There's so many bees here! -[Mochi mimics buzzing]
translation.zh: 这里有好多蜜蜂呀

translation.en: -Hello. -[beekeepers] Hello.
translation.zh: -你好 -你好

translation.en: Hi. Do you know anything about bees?
translation.zh: 嗨 你们了解蜜蜂吗？

translation.en: -Yes. -Yeah, we know a lot about bees.
translation.zh: -是的 -是啊 我们很了解蜜蜂

translation.en: So get your suits on and come here.
translation.zh: 穿上防护服 过来这里吧

translation.en: -Okay. Come on, Mochi. Let's go. -[Mochi meeps]
translation.zh: 好呢 我们走吧 麻薯

translation.en: -Hi. -Hello.
translation.zh: -嗨 -你好

translation.en: Hello. My name is Waffles, and this is my best friend Mochi.
translation.zh: 你好 我叫松饼 这是我的好朋友麻薯

translation.en: -I’m Gavin. -And I am Grady.
translation.zh: -我叫盖文 -我叫格雷迪

translation.en: Gavin and Grady. So, where are we?
translation.zh: 盖文和格雷迪 所以这里是什么地方？

translation.en: We’re at Hapa Honey Farm.
translation.zh: 我们在哈帕养蜂场

translation.en: Well, we have a little bit of a dilemma.
translation.zh: 我们现在面临着困境

translation.en: We wanna cook a meal for our friend Busy.
translation.zh: 我们想给朋友忙忙做一顿饭

translation.en: He’s a bee, so we figured we could cook something with honey.
translation.zh: 他是蜜蜂 所以我们觉得可以用蜂蜜做点美食

translation.en: Could you help us find honey?
translation.zh: 能帮我们找点蜂蜜吗？

translation.en: -Mm-hmm. We'll help you. -Thank you.
translation.zh: -我们会帮你的 -谢谢

translation.en: [Gavin] When you puff smoke on the bees, it calms them down.
translation.zh: 对着蜜蜂喷烟时 它们就会平静下来

translation.en: So what happens inside of a beehive?
translation.zh: 所以在蜂巢里会发生什么呢？

translation.en: [Gavin] In a beehive, there are three types of bees.
translation.zh: 在蜂巢里 有三种蜜蜂

translation.en: The queen will be inside, um, laying eggs.
translation.zh: 蜂后会在里面产卵

translation.en: -There are drones. -[Grady] The drones have bigger eyes.
translation.zh: 还有雄蜂 雄蜂的眼睛更大

translation.en: [Gavin] And then the worker bees are out getting pollen and nectar to make honey.
translation.zh: 工蜂负责采集花粉和花蜜来酿蜜

translation.en: So bees don't just like honey,
translation.zh: 所以蜜蜂不仅喜欢蜂蜜

translation.en: -they make honey? -Yep.
translation.zh: -他们还制造蜂蜜？ -是啊

translation.en: The bees have to work together, and they all have different jobs.
translation.zh: 蜜蜂必须团结工作 而且各有分工

translation.en: -Just like we do at the restaurant. -[meeps]
translation.zh: 就像我们在餐厅一样

translation.en: [Waffles] So, there’s a queen inside?
translation.zh: 所以里面有蜂后吗？

translation.en: [Gavin] Yep, the queen is the big bee who lays all the eggs.
translation.zh: 是的 蜂后就是产卵的大蜜蜂

translation.en: Sounds like a busy job.
translation.zh: 听上去很忙呢

translation.en: And I’m looking for the queen, which I just found.
translation.zh: 我正在寻找蜂后 刚刚找到了

translation.en: -The bee with the white dot is the queen. -[Waffles] Hello.
translation.zh: 有白点的蜜蜂就是蜂后

translation.en: [Grady] My dad marks them with that so we know it's the queen.
translation.zh: 这是我爸标记的 让我们能知道那就是蜂后

translation.en: Hello, Your Majesty.
translation.zh: 您好 殿下

translation.en: [Gavin] Okay, Waffles and Mochi, I'm gonna show what the honey looks like.
translation.zh: 好了 松饼和麻薯 我要给你们看看蜂蜜是什么样的

translation.en: -[Waffles] Look, Mochi, that’s honey. -[Mochi meeps]
translation.zh: 看啊 麻薯 那就是蜂蜜

translation.en: That’s a good question, Mochi.
translation.zh: 问得好 麻薯

translation.en: How can the bees communicate with each other?
translation.zh: 蜜蜂是如何互相沟通的呢？

translation.en: The scout bees go out early to look for all the forage,
translation.zh: 侦察蜂会提早出去寻找各种食物

translation.en: like nectar and pollen.
translation.zh: 比如花蜜和花粉

translation.en: And they do a little dance in front of the other bees
translation.zh: 然后他们会在其他蜜蜂面前跳一段舞

translation.en: to tell them where they are.
translation.zh: 告诉他们食物的位置

translation.en: We love to dance. What kind of dance?
translation.zh: 我们喜欢跳舞 什么舞蹈？

translation.en: It's called a waggle dance.
translation.zh: 叫做蜜蜂摇摆舞

translation.en: ♪ A waggle dance A waggle dance ♪
translation.zh: 蜜蜂摇摆舞 蜜蜂摇摆舞

translation.en: ♪ A waggle dance, waggle dance Waga-ga-ga da ♪
translation.zh: 蜜蜂摇摆舞 摇摆舞 摇摆摇摆

translation.en: So anyways, bees are really hard workers, and they're always busy.
translation.zh: 话说回来 蜜蜂都很勤劳 总是忙忙碌碌的

translation.en: Bees are responsible for about a third of the food that you put in your mouth.
translation.zh: 我们吃进嘴里的食物中 有三分之一是跟蜜蜂息息相关的

translation.en: A third of the food that we put in our mouth?
translation.zh: 三分之一的食物吗？

translation.en: -Yeah. -That's a big part of our restaurant.
translation.zh: -是啊 -在我们餐厅中的占比很高呢

translation.en: Unbelievable!
translation.zh: 难以置信！

translation.en: Wow. It sounds like bees are super important.
translation.zh: 哇 听起来蜜蜂超级重要呢

translation.en: Why don’t you come to our tasting table to pick out honey for your friend?
translation.zh: 要不要去品尝台 为你们的朋友挑选蜂蜜呢？

translation.en: -Yeah! -[cheers]
translation.zh: 好耶！

translation.en: Come on, let’s go. Chase me, Mochi!
translation.zh: 来吧 我们走 来追我呀 麻薯

translation.en: -Wow, look at all these jars of honey. -[Mochi meeps]
translation.zh: 哇哦 看看这些罐蜂蜜呀

translation.en: What is honey made from?
translation.zh: 蜂蜜是什么做的？

translation.en: Honey, we call it bee barf.
translation.zh: 我们管蜂蜜叫做蜜蜂呕吐物

translation.en: -"Bee barf?" -[meeps]
translation.zh: 蜜蜂呕吐物？

translation.en: -So, a bee gets nectar from a flower… -[Waffles] Mm-hmm.
translation.zh: 蜜蜂会从花中采集花蜜

translation.en: …and then spits it into another bee’s mouth,
translation.zh: 然后吐到另一只蜜蜂的嘴里

translation.en: and that bee spits it into another bee's mouth,
translation.zh: 那只蜜蜂再吐到另一只蜜蜂嘴里

translation.en: and it continues on for a while.
translation.zh: 这样持续一段时间

translation.en: -[groans] -[Gavin] And it slowly becomes honey,
translation.zh: 然后就慢慢变成蜂蜜了

translation.en: and they eventually put it into comb.
translation.zh: 最终他们会将其放进蜂巢里

translation.en: Depending on where the bees go to forage makes different kinds of honey.
translation.zh: 蜜蜂采蜜的地方不同 酿出的蜂蜜也就不同

translation.en: So if it’s orange blossom honey,
translation.zh: 如果是橘花蜜

translation.en: the bees are in a great big field of oranges.
translation.zh: 蜜蜂就是养在一大片橘林里

translation.en: And we have a forest honey,
translation.zh: 我们还有树蜜

translation.en: which is the sap that leaks out of the trees,
translation.zh: 也就是树上渗出的汁液

translation.en: and then aphids and other bugs eat the sticky, sweet sap.
translation.zh: 然后蚜虫和其他虫子 吃掉这些粘稠甜美的汁液

translation.en: -They poop out the sugar. -[yelps]
translation.zh: 然后把糖分拉出来

translation.en: -[man] Yeah. -Is poo-poo honey?
translation.zh: -是啊 -便便是蜂蜜吗？

translation.en: Then the bees take it back to their hive,
translation.zh: 然后蜜蜂将其带回蜂巢

translation.en: and they barf into each other's mouth, and then it becomes forest honey.
translation.zh: 互相吐到对方的嘴里 然后就变成树蜜了

translation.en: [Waffles] But where is your sense of adventure?
translation.zh: 是啊 麻薯 但你的冒险精神呢？

translation.en: I would love to try it.
translation.zh: 我很愿意试试呢

translation.en: You can.
translation.zh: 好啊

translation.en: Hello, honey.
translation.zh: 你好 蜂蜜

translation.en: -It's delicious. -[Mochi] Mm.
translation.zh: 太美味了

translation.en: -Do you like it, Mochi? -Mmm. [meeps]
translation.zh: 你喜欢吗 麻薯？

translation.en: Forest honey is also one of the most nutritious honey there is.
translation.zh: 树蜜也是最有营养的蜂蜜之一

translation.en: Forest honey is even more amazing than regular honey.
translation.zh: 树蜜比普通蜂蜜更神奇呢

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 是啊

translation.en: I can taste the nutrition.
translation.zh: 我能吃出营养的味道

translation.en: Or am I tasting the poop?
translation.zh: 还是便便的味道？

translation.en: -Poop. You're tasting the poop. -The nutrition. Nutrition.
translation.zh: -便便 你在品尝便便 -是营养啦

translation.en: Well, we have the honey. But how do we decide what to make with it?
translation.zh: 我们有蜂蜜了 但我们怎么决定用蜂蜜做些什么呢？

translation.en: Maybe let’s go talk to a chef.
translation.zh: 也许可以去找大厨聊聊

translation.en: -A chef. Yeah. -[both laugh]
translation.zh: 大厨 没错

translation.en: -[phone rings] -Oh. Sorry, gotta take this.
translation.zh: 抱歉 我要接一下电话

translation.en: -[Mochi meeps] -Hello.
translation.zh: 喂

translation.en: How's it going, you two?
translation.zh: 你们俩怎么样了？

translation.en: Good. We have honey. We're about to talk to a chef.
translation.zh: 很好 选好蜂蜜了 打算去找大厨聊聊

translation.en: Great! Things are getting a little better here. Busy stopped crying.
translation.zh: 太好了 这里情况好多了 忙忙不哭了

translation.en: [Busy] No. I was just taking a little break!
translation.zh: 不是 我只是休息一下！

translation.en: -You two better hurry. -We will.
translation.zh: -你俩最好快点 -好的

translation.en: Okay, Moch, let's learn how to cook with honey.
translation.zh: 好了 麻薯 我们去学习如何用蜂蜜烹饪吧

translation.en: -Are you guys in line for the bathroom? -[Busy gasps] I'm in here, Steven!
translation.zh: 你们在排队等洗手间吗？ 我在里面呢 史蒂夫！

translation.en: -Oh. -I'll ju… I'll just use another one.
translation.zh: 那我去用另一间洗手间吧

translation.en: Hi. Hi.
translation.zh: 嗨

translation.en: -How are you? -Hi, guys.
translation.zh: -你好吗？ -你们好呀

translation.en: Chef Samin. What are you doing here?
translation.zh: 萨米大厨 你在这里干啥？

translation.en: Oh, I'm making a delicious thing called honey confetti.
translation.zh: 我在制作一道美食 叫做蜂蜜彩花酱

translation.en: -Wanna help? Okay. -[Waffles] Yeah!
translation.zh: -想帮忙吗？好呢 -要的！

translation.en: So, we’re gonna put all sorts of delicious seeds in the honey,
translation.zh: 我们要把各种美味的籽实放进蜂蜜里

translation.en: and you can drizzle it on top of almost any dish.
translation.zh: 几乎可以把它淋在任何一道菜上

translation.en: -Will you help mix the seed mixture? -Sure.
translation.zh: 能帮我把籽实混进来吗？ 好了 这是一些烤黄芝麻

translation.en: [Samin] Okay, here’s some toasted yellow sesame seeds.
translation.zh: 好了 这是一些烤黄芝麻

translation.en: Here's some toasted pumpkin seeds, toasted poppy seeds.
translation.zh: 这是一些烤南瓜子 烤罂粟籽

translation.en: This is black sesame.
translation.zh: 这是黑芝麻

translation.en: And this is the sunflower. You can add all of those into there.
translation.zh: 这是葵花籽 可以全都加进去

translation.en: And now, there’s just one ingredient left to add.
translation.zh: 现在只剩一种食材了

translation.en: -Honey. -Honey!
translation.zh: -蜂蜜 -蜂蜜！

translation.en: Who's gonna help?
translation.zh: 谁来帮忙呢？

translation.en: -Me. -Me.
translation.zh: -我 -我

translation.en: -Let’s add this whole jar. -[Grady] Whoa!
translation.zh: 我们加一整罐吧

translation.en: [Samin] Now, we’re gonna make our dish.
translation.zh: 现在我们要做我们的菜了

translation.en: -These are some sweet potatoes. -[Waffles] Oh, that color.
translation.zh: 这些是红薯 瞧瞧那颜色

translation.en: [Samin] Aren’t they so pretty?
translation.zh: 是不是很漂亮？

translation.en: And then we’re gonna do our honey confetti.
translation.zh: 然后我们淋上蜂蜜彩花酱

translation.en: -[kids] Mmm! -Confetti, confetti, confetti!
translation.zh: 彩花酱！

translation.en: [Samin] And these are marigolds.
translation.zh: 这些是万寿菊

translation.en: Everyone ready to taste some sweet potato?
translation.zh: 大家准备好尝尝红薯了吗？

translation.en: -Yeah. -Yeah! Okay.
translation.zh: -要的 -耶！好呢

translation.en: Wait a minute. Samin, there's flowers on this.
translation.zh: 等一下 萨米 上面有花呢

translation.en: 'Course, there are flowers. They're edible.
translation.zh: 当然有花啦 是可以吃的

translation.en: The flowers aren't edible.
translation.zh: 但花是不能吃的

translation.en: Some flowers are edible.
translation.zh: 有些花是可以吃的

translation.en: We eat flowers all the time.
translation.zh: 我们经常吃花的

translation.en: -Mm? -Things like broccoli.
translation.zh: 比如西兰花

translation.en: [screams] Broccoli is a flower?
translation.zh: 西兰花是花吗？

translation.en: -Artichokes. -[meeps]
translation.zh: 洋蓟

translation.en: And cauliflower.
translation.zh: 还有花椰菜

translation.en: Cauliflower is a… flower?
translation.zh: 花椰菜…是花吗？

translation.en: You’re right, Mochi!
translation.zh: 你说得对 麻薯！

translation.en: Busy said cauliflower was his favorite thing when he was a little bee.
translation.zh: 忙忙说 小时候最喜欢花椰菜了

translation.en: You can make this dish with cauliflower instead of sweet potatoes.
translation.zh: 可以用花椰菜代替红薯来做这道菜

translation.en: I’m sorry, Samin, we gotta go and get cooking.
translation.zh: 对不起 萨米 我们得去烹饪了

translation.en: Go get cookin'!
translation.zh: 去做吧！

translation.en: Come on, Mochi!
translation.zh: 来吧 麻薯！

translation.en: -[all] Bye. -Come on, we gotta go!
translation.zh: -拜拜 -我们得走了！

translation.en: -Mochi, are you ready to get cooking? -[meeps excitedly]
translation.zh: 麻薯 你准备好去烹饪了吗？

translation.en: All right, time for Waffle speed!
translation.zh: 好了 松饼大加速！

translation.en: -Aprons on! -[Mochi] Mm-hmm.
translation.zh: 套上围裙！

translation.en: -Strings tied! -[Mochi meeps]
translation.zh: 系紧绑带！

translation.en: -Hats on! Let’s go! -[meeps excitedly]
translation.zh: 戴上厨师帽！开始吧！

translation.en: ♪ It’s time to hit the kitchen ♪
translation.zh: 厨房时间到

translation.en: ♪ And complete our mission ♪
translation.zh: 我们有任务要做好

translation.en: [all] ♪ What’s cookin'? What’s cookin'? ♪
translation.zh: 大家都在做什么呢？ 大家都在做什么呢？

translation.en: ♪ Let’s make a special dish That’s tasty and delish! ♪
translation.zh: 我们来做一道特色菜吧 味道好极啦！

translation.en: [all] ♪ What’s cookin'? What’s cookin'? ♪
translation.zh: 大家都在做什么呢？ 大家都在做什么呢？

translation.en: -[Mochi flutters lips] Mm? -Hey, Moch. Are you ready to make confetti honey cauliflower?
translation.zh: 麻薯 你准备好 做蜂蜜彩花酱花椰菜了吗？

translation.en: -[meeps] -All right, let's go.
translation.zh: 好了 我们来吧

translation.en: -[all] ♪ One ♪ -[Waffles] ♪ Slice a cauliflower ♪
translation.zh: -第一步！ -花椰菜切片

translation.en: ♪ Brush it with oil and roast it ♪
translation.zh: 刷油烤熟

translation.en: -[all] ♪ Two ♪ -[Waffles] ♪ Toast the seeds ♪
translation.zh: -第二步！ -炒熟籽实 混合蜂蜜

translation.en: -♪ And mix them with honey ♪ -[all] ♪ Three ♪
translation.zh: -第二步！ -炒熟籽实 混合蜂蜜 -第三步！ -抹上酸奶 进行摆盘

translation.en: [Waffles] ♪ Plate it up On a bed of yogurt ♪
translation.zh: -第三步！ -抹上酸奶 进行摆盘

translation.en: -[all] ♪ Four ♪ -[Waffles] ♪ Drizzle the honey confetti ♪
translation.zh: -第四步！ -淋上蜂蜜彩花酱

translation.en: ♪ And add some flowers ♪
translation.zh: 再加点花瓣 蜂蜜彩花酱花椰菜 大功告成！

translation.en: ♪ And there you have it, it’s confetti honey cauliflower! ♪
translation.zh: 蜂蜜彩花酱花椰菜 大功告成！

translation.en: -[all] ♪ Honey cauliflower ♪ -[bell dings]
translation.zh: 蜂蜜花椰菜！

translation.en: Order up.
translation.zh: 上菜啦

translation.en: Do… Do you whiff what I whiff?
translation.zh: 你也闻到那股味道了吗？

translation.en: What is that enchanting smell?
translation.zh: 那迷人的味道是什么？

translation.en: It's this!
translation.zh: 就是这道菜！

translation.en: What's going on here?
translation.zh: 这是什么情况？

translation.en: [chuckles] A fresh floral bouquet?
translation.zh: 一束鲜花

translation.en: Cooked cauliflower, like, back on the farm?
translation.zh: 煮熟的花椰菜 就像在农场一样

translation.en: Drizzled with… [gasps] …confetti honey?
translation.zh: 还淋上了…蜂蜜彩花酱

translation.en: I feel so loved.
translation.zh: 太有爱了

translation.en: [screams] It's delicious!
translation.zh: 太美味了！

translation.en: -[all] Hurray! -[Busy laughs]
translation.zh: 好耶！

translation.en: Today, Mochi and I found out that honey wouldn’t exist without bees.
translation.zh: 今天我和麻薯学到了 没有蜜蜂 就不会有蜂蜜

translation.en: They work so hard making it.
translation.zh: 他们采蜜非常努力

translation.en: Just like you do here at the restaurant.
translation.zh: 就像你在餐厅一样勤奋

translation.en: Oh, we appreciate you, Busy, and we’re sorry.
translation.zh: 谢谢你 忙忙 我们很抱歉

translation.en: That’s the sweetest thing anyone has ever said to me.
translation.zh: 这是我听过的最棒的蜜语甜言了！ 现在我想说说 你们对我来说有多重要

translation.en: And now, I would like to say how much you all mean to me.
translation.zh: 现在我想说说 你们对我来说有多重要

translation.en: Ooh, Busy’s gonna give us a speech.
translation.zh: 哟 忙忙要发表演讲啦

translation.en: No, Danny. Bees communicate through the power of dance.
translation.zh: 不是的 丹尼 蜜蜂是通过舞蹈交流的

translation.en: -Huh? -Hit it!
translation.zh: 音乐！

translation.en: -[Yuki] Okay. All right. -[Mochi giggles]
translation.zh: 好呢

translation.en: Yeah, Busy, okay.
translation.zh: 好呢 忙忙 来吧

translation.en: -Shake what your queen gave you. -Yeah!
translation.zh: 跳出蜂后教给你的舞步吧

translation.en: Come on, shake your stingers, everybody! [grunts]
translation.zh: 来吧 摇摆起来 各位！

translation.en: -[all] Go, Busy. Go, Busy. -That's right. Come on.
translation.zh: -加油 忙忙 -没错 来吧

translation.en: -Show me what you got! -[all] Go, Busy!
translation.zh: -让我看看你们的实力！ -加油 忙忙！
